Description.Text: Centrally located, the hotel is just 5 minutes from the main square in the city of Salta, July 9 Square. Guests can easily and quickly access the city's business and cultural centres. Near the hotel there are several attractions to visit such as the Cerro San Bernardo, which is a 10-minute drive, High Mountain Museum and the cathedral, which are 2 minutes' drive. La Caldera is only 20 minutes by car.

The hotel has comfortable rooms with a friendly atmosphere for rest and relaxation. Each room has a double bed, telephone, satellite/cable TV, Internet access, air conditioning, heating and a safe. The kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge, cooker, oven, microwave, coffee maker and dishes. The room has a private en suite bathroom with a shower and a bathtub as well as a balcony, and all are wheelchair-accessible.

The hotel offers a warm welcome and excellent services and facilities. Among the many services available to guests are the 24-hour front desk and 24-hour check-out and billing service, a currency exchange, hotel safe, cloakroom, mobile phone coverage, wireless Internet access, room service, a laundry service and a medical service. There are 21 rooms at this city hotel. Facilities available at the hotel also include a TV lounge, restaurant with air conditioning and lift access. The premises are wheelchair-accessible and private parking is available for an extra charge.
